00048 namespace kche_tree {

00050 // Forward-declare the class.
00051 template <typename T, const unsigned int D, typename S> class KDTree;
00052 
00053 // Forward-declare the stream operators.
00054 template <typename T, const unsigned int D, typename S>
00055 std::istream & operator >> (std::istream &in, KDTree<T, D, S> &kdtree);

00058 std::ostream & operator << (std::ostream &out, const KDTree<T, D, S> &kdtree);

00071 template <typename T, const unsigned int D, typename S = KVector<VectorDistance<T>, VectorDistance<T> > >
00072 class KDTree {
00073 public:
00075   static unsigned const int Dimensions = D;
00076 
00078   typedef Vector<T, D> Point;
00079 
00081   typedef VectorDistance<T> Neighbour;
00082 
00083   // Constructors and destructors.
00084   KDTree(); 
00085   ~KDTree(); 
00086 
00087   // Basic kd-tree operations.
00088   bool build(const DataSet<T, D>& train_set, unsigned int bucket_size = 32); 
00089   void knn(const Point &p, unsigned int K, std::vector<Neighbour> &output, const T &epsilon = Traits<T>::zero(), bool ignore_p_in_tree = false) const; 
00090   void all_in_range(const Point &p, const T &distance, std::vector<Neighbour> &output, bool ignore_p_in_tree = false) const; 
00091 
00093   const Point &operator [] (unsigned int index) const;
00094 
00095   // Stream operators.
00096   friend std::istream &operator >> <>(std::istream &in, KDTree &kdtree);
00097   friend std::ostream &operator << <>(std::ostream &out, const KDTree &kdtree);
00098 
00099   // Kd-tree properties.
00100   unsigned int size() const { return num_elements; } 
00101 
00102 #ifdef _KCHE_TREE_DEBUG_
00103   bool verify() const;
00104 #endif
00105 
00106 private:
00107   // Internal methods.
00108   void release(); 
00109 
00110   // Kd-tree data.
00111   KDNode<T, D> *root; 
00112   Point *data; 
00113   unsigned int *permutation; 
00114   unsigned int *inverse_perm; 
00115   unsigned int num_elements; 
00116 
00117   // File serialization settings.
00118   static const char *file_header; 
00119   static const unsigned short file_header_length; 
00120   static const unsigned short file_version[2]; 
00121   static const unsigned short signature; 
00122 };
00123 
00124 } // namespace kche_tree
